name: You Are A Frog And All You Can Do Is Scream
name_original: You Are A Frog And All You Can Do Is Scream
description:
A prompt from my friend who said I should make as game jam game: "You Are A Frog And All You Can Do Is Scream".

Here it is. This is your fault.

To avoid blowing out your eardrums make sure the sound of the fly is fairy quiet.
